data.title: Asya Kuchina - Head Of Marketing at QArea
data.meta_description: Asya Kuchina has a diverse work experience in marketing and communications roles.
data.text:
Asya Kuchina has a diverse work experience in marketing and communications roles. Asya started their career as a PR executive at Imageland Public Relations and then worked as an Account Manager and New Business Manager at fresh advertising company. Asya later became the Head of Marketing at UMH DIGITAL and also served as a Brand Manager there. Asya then moved on to allbiz global, where they worked as the Head of Corporate Communications. Asya then joined Intellectsoft as a Digital Marketer, managing multi-channel marketing programs. Asya co-founded a small family-run manufacture called Local Foodie, producing hand-crafted artisan dry-cured sausages and meat. Asya then held the position of Head of Marketing at TestFort, an award-winning QA and Testing company. Currently, Asya is the Head of Marketing at QArea, a unique web product company with an emphasis on engineering and product crafting. In their roles, Asya has been responsible for various marketing functions such as market research, lead generation, content marketing, web assets management, and sales support.

Asya Kuchina's education history includes a Bachelor's degree in Political Science from the National University of Kyiv-Mohyla Academy, where they studied at the Department of Social Science and Technologies. Asya completed this degree from 2003 to 2007. Following this, they pursued a Master's degree in Political Science at Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv from 2007 to 2008.

In addition to their degrees in Political Science, Asya also obtained a certification in marketing. Asya attended the Netherlands Institute of Marketing from 2005 to 2008 and achieved a diploma in NIMA-A. Later, in 2012, they completed a Marketing Course at Kyiv-Mohyla Business School to further enhance their skills in marketing.

As for additional certifications, Asya obtained a certification in Practical Management from MIM-Kyiv Business School, although the specific month of obtaining this certification is not available. Asya also attended the Total Marketing Summer School at Kyiv-Mohyla Business School in 2012. In 2009, Asya acquired the Marketing A-1 certification from NIMA, Nederlands Instituut voor Marketing in May.
